items.question: How popular was Gravity Falls, compared to Phineas and Ferb?
Is Gravity Falls going to have a second season?
items.answer: Gravity Falls' second season kicked off in summer 2014.Between the first and second season, a variety of "short films" relating to Gravity Falls have been aired. The final set aired June 2, 2014. It is expected after the final set of shorts that we will see a formal announcement regarding the number of episodes, season premiere date, and more.
